rule.ruleDesc: Run Scheduled Action to set Problem status to "Resolved"
rule.condition: open in $L.file.src="Resolved" and rcStatus in $L.file~="Resolved" and rcStatus in $L.file~="Closed"
rule.conditionDesc: ( Expression: open in $L.file.src="Resolved" and rcStatus in $L.file~="Resolved" and rcStatus in $L.file~="Closed")
rule.conditionXML: <XmlCondition><collection logical="" negate=""><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="expression"><Expression caption="">"open in $L.file.src="Resolved" and rcStatus in $L.file~="Resolved" and rcStatus in $L.file~="Closed""</Expression></operand></condition></collection></XmlCondition>
rule.fullDesc: Run Scheduled Action to set Problem status to "Resolved" (when ( Expression: open in $L.file.src="Resolved" and rcStatus in $L.file~="Resolved" and rcStatus in $L.file~="Closed"))
rule.ruleJSON: {"type":"runScheduledAction","calcType":2,"calcField":"","calcInterval":"","calcScript":"actionExecutionTime=new Date();","actionCondition":"( not same( rcStatus in $L.file,\"Resolved\") AND not same( rcStatus in $L.file,\"Closed\") )","actionConditionXml":"<XmlCondition><collection logical=\"\" negate=\"\"><condition logical=\"\" negate=\"false\"><operand type=\"field\"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption=\"Status\">rcStatus</FieldName></operand><Comparison>neq</Comparison><Value dataType=\"\">Resolved</Value></condition><condition logical=\"AND\" negate=\"false\"><operand type=\"field\"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption=\"Status\">rcStatus</FieldName></operand><Comparison>neq</Comparison><Value dataType=\"\">Closed</Value></condition></collection></XmlCondition>","rulesetName":"","action":"resolved.by.interaction"}

rule.ruleDesc: Run Scheduled Action to set Problem status to "Work In Progress"
rule.condition: (open in $L.file.src) isin {"In Progress", "Work In Progress", "Dispatched"} and (rcStatus in $L.file) isin {"Resolved", "Pending"}
rule.conditionDesc: ( Expression: open in $L.file.src isin {"In Progress","Work In Progress","Dispatched"} and rcStatus in $L.file isin {"Resolved","Pending"})
rule.conditionXML: <XmlCondition><collection logical="" negate=""><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="expression"><Expression caption="">"open in $L.file.src isin {"In Progress","Work In Progress","Dispatched"} and rcStatus in $L.file isin {"Resolved","Pending"}"</Expression></operand></condition></collection></XmlCondition>
rule.fullDesc: Run Scheduled Action to set Problem status to "Work In Progress" (when ( Expression: open in $L.file.src isin {"In Progress","Work In Progress","Dispatched"} and rcStatus in $L.file isin {"Resolved","Pending"}))
rule.ruleJSON: {"type":"runScheduledAction","calcType":2,"calcField":"","calcInterval":"","calcScript":"actionExecutionTime=new Date();","actionCondition":"( rcStatus in $L.file=\"Resolved\" OR rcStatus in $L.file=\"Pending\")","actionConditionXml":"<XmlCondition><collection logical=\"\" negate=\"\"><condition logical=\"\" negate=\"false\"><operand type=\"field\"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption=\"Status\">rcStatus</FieldName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType=\"\">Resolved</Value></condition><condition logical=\"OR\" negate=\"false\"><operand type=\"field\"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption=\"Status\">rcStatus</FieldName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType=\"\">Pending</Value></condition></collection></XmlCondition>","rulesetName":"pbm.set.status.to.inprogress","action":"1"}
